parameters: she was a mid-level manager at the biggest tech company in the city.
We’ve been close ever since college.
Three years ago, her straightforward nature made her confess to me...
that was the happiest moment of my life.\|
After graduation, we all got jobs and moved in together.
It’s been five years since we met,
and our happiness hasn’t faded one bit.
Mikura City has yet to receive any military support.
After the disaster, the government shut down all social media,
though the city still has water,
But it only allows for local communication among citizens.
Still no signs of military intervention today...
\n<\n[2]>Didn't the news report a few days ago that the military
had almost wiped out the infected in nearby towns?
\n<\n[2]>Why is this area of Mikura still under lockdown,
getting only supply drops but no actual intervention?
Find supplies – No matter what, I have to go.
Explore – The government's schemes won’t stop me.
Find supplies – No matter what, I have to go.
Explore – The government's schemes won’t stop me.
At first, I found it hard to believe the rumors circulating
on the survivors' internal forum—claims that
the military’s divided responsibilities left the three warehouses unmanaged.
But now, it seems they were true.
\n<\n[2]>Honey, maybe we should wait a little longer...
We still have enough supplies to last a few more days.
It might still be dangerous out there...
From the window, things outside seem to have stabilized.
From the window, things outside seem to have stabilized.
After observing the situation and gathering information over the past few days,
I learned that a residential area near my home has become a safe zone.
Most survivors who didn’t perish in the first wave of the outbreak hadn’t stockpiled food either.
About a week into the crisis, they were forced to leave their homes as supplies ran out.
But lacking combat skills and survival experience, most of them ended up as new wandering zombies...\|
By the second week, a man named Yamashita appeared and turned things around.
He claims to be a retired officer and has gathered many followers.
They hunt the infected in an organized and disciplined manner.
With astonishing efficiency, they cleared out the entire area.\|
Before long, the citizens recognized him as the leader of this zone.
The layout of this community is easy to defend and difficult to attack,
and over time, it became the only safe place in the hellscape of Mikura City.\|
There may be other survivors outside the safe zone,
but they’re likely scattered, struggling to survive in small groups...
By contrast, life inside the safe zone is far more comfortable.
Thanks to Yamashita’s disciplined leadership, essential infrastructure—
such as trade stations and hospitals—continues to function.
...I've even heard rumors about a plan to open a bar soon?
Alcohol is the only thing that can help everyone forget,
even just for a moment, and keep their sanity intact...
I'm just going down for a while, it's okay
I'm just going down for a while, it's okay
And keep your phone with you! Stay in touch at all times!
Click the phone icon in the top-left corner or
press the "C" key on your keyboard to use the phone.
When you receive a message, a notification will appear on the icon.

In just a little while, we’ll be stepping into the sacred halls of marriage.
This moment marks an important beginning in our lives, as we set out carrying each other’s love and promises.
Perhaps the road ahead will hold many unknown challenges for us, and there may be moments of exhaustion and uncertainty.
But no matter how life ebbs and flows, we will always hold on to the pure and profound feelings we share in this moment.
No matter the setbacks or trials we face, we will never give up on each other, nor will we let our love fade in the face of hardship.
Through laughter and tears, in good times and bad, we will hold each other’s hands tightly and move forward with unwavering determination.
Even if one day the world collapses and the end times come,
our love will remain like the morning star in the darkest night, forever lighting up each other’s hearts, never fading.
We will love each other endlessly, protecting each other, until the end of time, until the very edge of the world.
